name: ZkwuL – The game
description:
Explore a big and colorfoul 3D world, with +250 ennemies and PNG. Quests ! Lore ! Action ! Romance ! Secret endings ! Multipl– Oh, wait, it's not that at all. Fuck.

Hello there ! This is my first game !

It's since June that I develop this game. I'm new with GameMaker Studio 2, and I try to learn how to use this wonderful application. ZkuwL is a 2D game inspired by some games like World hardest game and using easy-to-create-as-fuck mechanics like... keys... canons... spikes... Well, that's enough, isn't it ? >_>'

Controls

You can move with the directional arrows (up, down, left, right uh uh), and reset the room with R

Credits

I use the song "Arcade Puzzler" by Eric Matryas (thanks to him !). You can check his songs at www.soundimage.com

If you enjoyed the game, that's great ! Please tell me if you liked something particulary, or if you want more levels. Please, no, I'm a pretty bad level designer.

Have a good day !
